articles.title: Apple doesn’t make a MagSafe car charger — here are your options - The Verge
articles.description: There have been a few car chargers released that are MagSafe compatible, but there isn’t one yet that has the trinity of being MagSafe certified and able to magnetically mount and charge. Why is that?
articles.content:
